text: Guy A. Sansaricq (October 6, 1934 - August 21, 2021) was a Haitian-born American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was Auxiliary bishop of the Diocese of Brooklyn, New York from 2006 to 2010. He was born in Jérémie, Haiti. Sansaricq died on August 21, 2021 in New York City, aged 86.L’Evêque émérite, Mgr Guy Sansaricq, est mort à New-York ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Haitian people Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:21st-century Haitian people Category:20th-century Haitian people
title: Guy Sansaricq
